title: Ownership and personal use of tablet computers 2012 , by country
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of population for 8 number of Countrys.
The Percentage of population is highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country Germany.
The highest Country Spain has 14.0 more Percentage of population than the lowest Country Germany.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of population for 8 number of Countrys.
The Percentage of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country Germany.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of population for 8 number of Countrys.
The Percentage of population is highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country Germany.
The highest Country Spain has 14.0 more Percentage of population than the lowest Country Germany.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Percentage of population in the y axis.
The Percentage of population is highest at Country Spain and lowest at Country Germany.
Second maximum Percentage of population is found at Country Australia.
The Percentage of population of Country Germany is 2.4% smaller than the maximum value at Spain.
Country Spain is higher than any other Countrys with value 24.0, followed by Australia, and Italy. Down to Country Germany with the lowest value 10.0.
Country Spain, and Australia have the same Percentage of population.
The Country Spain tends to be 1.31 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 147.0.
